home.message: My name is Nirjal Paudel. I love

projects.name: Hifoods
projects.desp: Hifoods is a multivendor resturant service. It is made using nestjs. It implements caching and queue processing with redis. It also uses amazon s3 for image storage. It also implements sharp for image compression, TWOLIO for SMS and email notification. It implments HTTP2 and uses helmet for security. It also uses AWS for cloud storage and google for google map api. It also uses stripe for payment gateway. It does implment real time communication using sockets.io

projects.name: Netflix Clone
projects.desp: A clone of website i.e. Netflix. It links REST API of TMDB API. TMDB API is a great API for accessing movie database, trailer, etc

projects.name: Tarkari App
projects.desp: An e-commerce based site for vegetables. This could solve many problems in lock down and quarantine.

projects.name: SmartAgro
projects.desp: Here we propose a smart way to tackle the food crisis by increasing the crops production rate, ensuring proper health of crops, market value and demand of the crops and plantation of the specific crop in response to the AI predicted.

projects.name: Portfolio - JSON based
projects.desp: In this react based app, I have made a protfolio that gets all it's content from a JSON file. A JSON file with practical details like name, projects build,socials, etc. This very website is built using this ReactJS app

projects.name: Kamao Nepal
projects.desp: Kamao Nepal is a REST API for tiktok alike application. I used Nodejs for kamao. It serves static files from AWS or Local depending upon the current file location. It is probably the most secure backend that I have build. Unit Testing, End to End tetsing were performed. Follows MVC pattern

projects.name: Nirman Solution
projects.desp: Nirman solution is an ecommerce platform built using TYPEORM and NESTJS. It use redis as caching provider and implments cache wirte through policy
